experience.title_project: Convert an existing API to comply with TMF standards and add unit testing

descriptions.desc: Analysis of the current API (models, routes, payloads)
Alignment with TMF APIs (e.g., TMF620, TMF622 depending on context)
Code correction and refactoring to ensure full compatibility
Implementation or improvement of unit tests to ensure functional quality
Verification of backward compatibility and technical documentation
The goal is to ensure better interoperability, maintainability, and standardization of the system’s exposed interfaces
